feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:22 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -19.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -19.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -26.8°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:20 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:20 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. A few local snow squalls early in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:20 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
